name: Farrah
greetingDialogue: Hi! Can you cut my hair?
positiveReaction: I... wow. I'm scared, yet more confident.

dialogues.text: Can I ask you something? Do you ever feel not like yourself around other people? like you're not fitting in, even though you look so alike?
Wow, I can talk with you about this. I truly want to fit in, but I also want to be myself, y'know?

responses.text: You might want a different haircut.

dialogues.text: I'm not sure. I've been really insecure about myself recently. I'm not comfortable with my... identity. If that makes sense.

responses.text: I can give you more confidence.
Are you able to express yourself?

dialogues.text: I'm not hot on the prescribed haircuts, I admit. But if I didn't have one, what would the others say? That scares me.
That's both wise and vague. But I can see keeping a balance is good for my health. Or is it selfish?
Really? You mean with a haircut? I don't know. It's not allowed. But then again, imagine how cool I could look.
Barely. Now that you say it, I thinks that is what's wrong. I have no ways of showing others who I really am.
